SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionButton
A kind of button that is meant for action, like any kind of action that has an ON/OFF state (like music, fun mode..)
ActionButton.Action
 
AnimationController
Gives all needed instruments to animate Entities.
AudioManager
Class to load and manage audio.
Bubble
Class for bubbles.
BubblesContainer
Class to store Bubble instances.
BubblesController
Class to manage Bubbles (update and draw)
Button
Generic class for all kinds of buttons.
Collectable
Superclass for Collectables, such as Items and Powers.
CollectablesContainer
 
CollectablesController
Class to manage Collectables (update and draw)
Context
Enum for current game context, used by Game class to decide what to update/draw.
Credits
Class to manage Credits Context.
Delete
Class to manage Delete Context, where you can delete profile.
EasterEgg
Class to manage EasterEgg Context.
EggButton
Buttons for an easter egg.
EnemiesContainer
Class to store all enemies in a level and load them.
EnemiesController
Class to manage enemies (update and draw)
Enemy
Class to create and manage Enemies.
EnemyBoss
Class for enemy kind BOSS, similar to Enemy Mighta but can't be trapped in a bubble and his life points decreases every time a bubble hits him.
EnemyInvader
Class for enemy kind INVADER, see class enemy for general behaviour.
EnemyMighta
Class for enemy kind INVADER, unlike other enemies it floats in air.
EnemyZen
Class for enemy kind ZEN, standard enemy behaviour
Entity
 
FileManager
Class to load and save all kind of needed files (beside audios managed by AudioManager).
FileNames
Contains all path to files meant to be loaded except profiles and levels.
Game
Class to control the whole game.
GameOver
Class for GameOver context, applyed when player dies.
GamePanel
 
GenericContext
Class for a generic Context, includes background image, fonts, avatars pictures and window dimension ( width and height)
HeadBar
 
HiddenButton
Class for hidden buttons that are not meant to be updated or drawed.
Item
Class to create an Item.
JBubbleBobble
Main class, starts Game Engine.
KeyboardInputs
Custom KeyListener, propagates KeyEvents to Context Controllers.
Level
Level class, stores level data in a bidimensional int array, player start position and a map for enemies start position.
LevelController
 
Load
Class to manage Load Context, where you can load a profile.
LoadSlot
Buttons used for load slots.
Menu
Class to manage Menu Context.
MenuButton
Class for Menu Buttons.
MouseInputs
Custom mouse listener, propagates MouseEvents to Context controllers.
MusicPlayer
A music player that shows current track name, buttons to listen to previous or next song, and sound controls.
NewGame
Class to manage New Game Context, used to create profiles and start a new game.
NextLevel
Class to manage Next Level Context.
Options
Class to manage Options Context.
Pause
Class to manage Pause context.
Player
Class for player charachter in game.
PlayerController
Class to manage player (update and draw)
Playing
Class to manage Playing context.
Power
Class to create Powers.
Profile
Class for player profile, with a nickname and an avatar selection.
ProfilesController
 
SortButton
Button specifically designed for sorting fields.
Statistics
Class to manage Statistics context.
TextField
Used to store and draw typed nickname in New Game Context.
Tutorial
Class to manage Tutorial Context.
Win
Class to manage Win Context.
WindowFrame
